alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 27 at 6:36PM MST until January 28 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Localized gusts of 50 to 60 mph near southwest facing terrain, with even higher speeds over the San Francisco Peaks. * WHERE...Areas immediately south and southwest of the San Francisco Peaks and Mt Elden. Areas from Stoneman Lake northward to Munds Park. Areas just southwest of the Mogollon Rim, but generally north of Payson. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Friday. The period of strongest wind is expected from 8 PM MST tonight through 3 AM MST Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized damage possible in Skyline Estates, Mt Elden Estates and Schultz Creek Road. Localized damage possible near Washington Park, Kohls Ranch and Stoneman Lake.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
